name: Trash Derby
description:
Like a combination of Monkeyball and MarioKart with trash for powerups, made in under 40 hours for the SGDA 40 hour game jam. Also my first game made using Godot. Pulled an all nighter finishing it on time, and now it is time to sleep. Oh and I made it on my own.

Also a number of things are missing, the options don't change the player name because I couldn't fix that on time, and the mouse disappears on menus for some reason making it difficult to actually use them. Also two of the trash powerups are missing their models because I couldn't fix them in time. All that will be fixed once the jam is over.

How to play:

Left controller stick to move

Right controller stick to look around

A button to jump

Start to pause

Game was made for 2 controllers
